data.name: BooleanComparisonMode
desc: specifies different mode how boolean comparison predicates are to be generated by a SingleSelectQueryComposer.

items.name: EQUAL_INTEGER
lines: Most databases support comparing boolean expressions or column values directly with integer values: column = 0 respectively column = 1.

items.name: IS_LITERAL
lines: requires to use IS boolean_literal for boolean comparison.
That is, the generated comparison predicates will be column IS TRUE resp. column IS FALSE.

items.name: EQUAL_LITERAL
lines: requires to use = boolean_literal for boolean comparison.
That is, the generated comparison predicates will be column = TRUE resp. column = FALSE.

items.name: ACCESS_COMPAT
lines: requires to use an Microsoft Access compatible syntax for boolean comparison.
